column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I've been to many museums in many different towns and the collection at the Art Institute is second to none. Even if you know nothing about art
column2: you are going to recognize many of the iconic paintings on display here. A few of the highlights include Grant Wood's American Gothic
column3: Georges Seurat's A Sunday on La Grande Jatte
column5: Henri Matisse's Bathers by the River and Pablo Picasso's Old Man with Guitar (Keith Richards?)
